title: Video2Brain - Introducing PHP
description: PHP is the most popular server-side language used to build dynamic websites, and though it is not especially difficult to use, non-programmers often find it intimidating. This workshop from author and trainer David Powers is designed to change that by teaching you PHP through a series of clear, focused, easy-to-follow lessons. After briefly explaining what PHP is and how it integrates with HTML, David will guide you through the setup and configuration of a PHP development environment on both Windows and Mac OS X. Then youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll learn the features of the PHP language through a series of hands-on exercises before embarking on a larger project that involves building a script to validate and email user input from an online form. Through this project youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll come to understand the value of creating reusable code, the importance of PHP security, and how to deal with multiple-choice form fields.
